meanings.sent1: He quickly unbreeches before jumping into the pool.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, he unbreeches and relaxes on the couch.
meanings.sent3: The magician unbreeches to reveal a pair of shorts underneath his pants.
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the sky seems to unbreeches its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's secret identity is unveiled when he unbreeches.

meanings.sent1: She unbreeches before changing into her pajamas.
meanings.sent2: In the locker room, the athletes quickly unbreeches after the game.
meanings.sent3: The clown unbreeches to reveal polka dot boxers, much to the audience's amusement.
meanings.sent4: The old tree slowly unbreeches its bark as it grows taller each year.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar unbreeches its old skin to emerge as a beautiful butterfly.
